attributes.action: Directive 80/181 Banning the use of Non-Metric Measurements in 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If this happens then this country's artefact's that were built to imperial measurements will fall apart as the correct sized parts, nuts and bolts  will not be available. 
Think about the loss of cars, traction engines and locomotives, just for a start that will disappear as they will not be able to order Imperial sized steel plate and tubes.
Please lets NOT lose our country's history to the EU.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
